thread.title: Morgan Freeman seen in Cairo streets as he films 'The Story of God' - Film - Arts & Culture
thread.title_full: Morgan Freeman seen in Cairo streets as he films 'The Story of God' - Film - Arts & Culture - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Morgan Freeman seen in Cairo streets as he films 'The Story of God' - Film - Arts & Culture
text:
Renowned American actor Morgan Freeman was seen Monday in El-Moez Street in Cairo, according to El-Moez Street Facebook page and media reports.
The 78-year old actor arrived in Cairo from Turkey on Sunday to film a documentary titled The story of God for National Geographic.
The American Actor Morgan Freeman during a tour in Cairo's El Moez Street. (Photo Courtesy of EL Moez Street on Facebook)
During his five-day visit, Freeman will visit the pyramids in Giza and different tourist sites in Cairo, Aswan and Luxor.
Last June, National Geographic Channel announced that Freeman would host and be the executive producer of The Story of God that explores religions and religious rituals. The documentary will be showcased in 2016.
Freeman is an American actor who is famous for his role in Bruce Almighty (which was initially banned in Egypt) alongside Jim Carey and Jennifer Aniston and The Shawshank Redemption.
He also co-stars with Jack Nicholson in the 2007 film The Bucket List where there is a scene of them sitting together at the Giza pyramids.
Circulated photo on Social Media of the American Actor Morgan Freeman in Cairo on Kasr El-Nile bridge. (Photo Courtesy of Facbook)
